title: So after at least 3 years of there being no lights on at the exit ramp of 421 South onto 74/76 west, they were finally on a couple of weeks ago, but for only a couple of nights. What\'s going on there?  Why can\'t DOT get the lights on and keep them on.  Considering how dangerous they have made it with reconfiguring the 2 lanes down to 1, you\'d think they would want to make sure the lights work, before somebody gets killed.
